definitions: an ancient Egyptian tomb rectangular in shape with sloping sides and a flat roof, standing to a height of 17–20 feet (5–6 m), consisting of an underground burial chamber with rooms above it (at ground level) in which to store offerings.
shortDefinitions: ancient Egyptian tomb consisting of underground burial chamber with rooms above it at ground level

definitions: (in Islamic countries) a bench, typically of stone, attached to a house.
shortDefinitions: (in Islamic countries) stone or brick bench built into wall of house
